lines.text: Picnics are so much fun Alvie, you'll have the best time in your whole life.
[After hearing an obvious impression of James Cagney.]
One thing bothers me - that voice. I've heard that voice before!
We got you a television if you're real good tomorrow, you can watch Wonder Woman. What do you want for breakfast?
Chocolate milk, cocoa puff, buttermilk, chocolate strawberries, peaches, wheaties, chocolate bananas, pancakes, sausage, toast, oatmeal - apple, and bacon.
[While Savannah is going on and on]
Tomorrow we're getting rid of this kid, lets see if we can get her to go to sleep.
YAA! HOO! HOO! We did it, we did it I planned the whole thing and it worked. Hey aren't you happy, aren't you going to thank me?
Yeah, thanks a lot I get paroled on Friday.

[driving a rickety old stolen car]
Where did you steal this car from?
The keys were in it and the engine was running, so I just stole it! Pretty good, huh?
That is NOT how you steal this car, that is how someone else gets RID of it!
